Member Function Documentation

AppointmentsController::add (  ) 

Add a patient appointment POST to this service since it creates a new record

Parameters:
data[json],a POST param. Sample: {"patient_id": "6", // required unless user is a patient (in which case ignored) "datetime": "2012-08-15 21:00:00", // optional default now; pass local i.e. not GMT "location": "clinic B, front desk", // optional "staff_id": "99"} // optional
data[AppController][AppController_id],a POST param. Pass the "acidValue" js var.
Returns:
appropriate http code, and json w/ fields "ok" (bool) and "message". Samples: {"ok": true, "message": "999 [the id of the new appt]"} {"ok": false, "message": "Appointments must be at least 48 hours apart."}

these don't need checking if (isset($this->request->data['Appointment']['location'])){ $newApptData['datetime'] = $this->request->data['Appointment']['location']; } if (isset($newApptData['staff_id'])){ $newApptData['datetime'] = $this->request->data['Appointment']['staff_id']; }

AppointmentsController::edit (  ) 

Edit a patient's appointment PUT to this service

Parameters:
data[json],a PUT param. Sample: {"data[Patient][id]": "6", // required unless user is a patient (in which case ignored) "data[Appointment][0][id]": "12345", // required "data[Appointment][0][datetime]": "2012-08-15 21:00:00", // optional; pass local i.e. not GMT "data[Appointment][0][location]": "clinic B, front desk", // optional "data[Appointment][0][staff_id]": "99"} // optional
data[AppController][AppController_id],a PUT param. Pass the "acidValue" js var.
Returns:
appropriate http code, and json w/ fields "ok" (bool) and "message". Samples: {"ok": true, "message": "999 [the id of the appt]"} {"ok": false, "message": "Appointments must be at least 48 hours apart."}
